experience: Senior IT Operations Analyst | Change Manager

Maintained the daily operations of ADE IT Operations unit and its various components to ensure compliance with agency, local, state, and federal policies and regulations. Established and implemented unit policies and procedures as well as prepare operational analysis and reports/audits of current procedures to monitor and improve efficiency of operations.  Responsible for providing advice and assistance to senior management in the planning, implementation, and evaluation of modifications to existing operations, systems, and procedures.  Documented actions and proceduresTechnologies: ITIL, SQL 2008 R2, SQL Report Writer 2.0, Visual Studio 2010, Team Foundation Server, Sharepoint 2010, Active Batch v.8,

For Maricopa County Court Technology SystemsDeveloped inventory database to allow the proper tracking of computer hardware and software for the Maricopa County Court System.  Responsibilities: Business analysis, design, production, documentation and implementation of application and subsequent reports.Technologies: Access 2010, Excel 2010, Sharepoint Workspace 2010

Created applications that uses geographical data to plot monthly routes for service technicians, as well as financial analysis of the routing cycle.  Responsibilities: 	Business analysis, design, production, documentation and implementation of applications.  Maintining nightly data backups, hardware set up and repairTechnologies: 	Access 97/2003/2007, MapPoint 2006, Excel 2003
Responsibilities: Analysis, design, production, documentation and implementation of business applicationsTechnologies: Access 2007, VBA, Visual Studio 2005

Responsibilities:  Oversaw team of four developers conducting business analysis, database architecture, user interface design, development, testing, documentation and ongoing maintenance of database toolsTechnologies: 	SQL Server 2000/2005, Access 97/2003, VBA, VB 6.0, VB.NET, Excel 2003, Visual Studio 2003/2005, SharePoint 2005, Visio 2003, MS Project 2003

recommendations: I hired Robin to work at First Service Networks.  Robin’s main duties were to maintained and perform development work on one of the organization’s databases.  His development work included an ingenious method to plan and route the work schedules of HVAC maintenance technicians.  Robin worked closely with others in the organization including other IT and data professionals, financial analysts, and technician service managers.  Robin also expanded his skill set and helped the organization with PC tech support and network issues.  I highly recommend Robin and would welcome the opportunity to work with him again in the future
